text: Several television series were based on the Mario series of video games, started by Nintendo. ==Series== *Saturday Supercade *The Super Mario Bros. Super Show! *King Koopa's Kool Kartoons *The Adventures of Super Mario Bros. 3 *Super Mario World *The Super Mario Challenge ===Anime=== *Super Mario Amada anime series ==Regular characters== Character Television OVAs Film Saturday Supercade (1983-1984) The Super Mario Bros. (1986) Super Mario Bros.
